resources.string:
For more information visit the project site on Github: https://github.com/scoute-dich/Browser

With this update \"Ninja Browser\" is used as base for \"Browser\". The concept remains the old: simple but powerful with a nice looking user interface. Main advantage of this step are a better implementation of tabs. Now you can open as many tabs as you wish. Also you have a new startpage. Please read the new \"Help dialog\" for more information.

- new: Chinese translation (Thanks: lishoujun)
- new: close current tab in menu
- new: share text to browser
- improved: hide/show toolbar
- fix: night mode (now in UI settings)
- fix: force close when clicking direct download link
- fix: screenshot, when started via holder service
- fix: some strings
- fix: possible force close on Android > Nougat
At the bottom of the screen you have the toolbar. You can reload the current website and open the menu. Swipe the toolbar up to open the tab control. To switch between tabs swipe left or right.

Click the preview of a tab to select it, click again to close the tab preview. To close a tab simply swipe to preview to the top or bottom. At the bottom you can open a new tab, the download folder, your login data, your bookmarks or the browser history (from left to right).
Notifications are displayed on the bottom of the screen. They can be dismissed by clicking anywhere outside.
Use the \"Nav Button\" in the fullscreen mode: swipe up/down -> scroll to top/bottom; swipe left/right -> navigate back/forward; click -> open the menu; long click -> open \"Fast toggle dialog\".
There are even more options in the settings. Try it out!

For more information visit the project site on Github: https://github.com/scoute-dich/Browser

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses.

SimpleEncryptionLib

hummatli
https://github.com/hummatli/SimpleEncryptionLib

On following sites you can get more information about \"Browser\":

XDA-thread:
XDA is a great community for developers and smartphone enthusiasts. Here you can report issues, ask for new features and everything other related to \"Browser\".
https://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-browser-t3500091

Github:
On Github you can see the source code of \"Browser\". This is the more technical solution: open issues, ask for new features or even help developing or translating.
https://github.com/scoute-dich/browser


Following people contributed at this project:

Gaukler Faun
Main developer and initiator of this project.
https://github.com/scoute-dich

CGSLURP LLC
Helped to implement AdBlock and \"request desktop site\" in the previous version of \"Browser\".
https://github.com/futrDevelopment

Jumping Yang
Chinese translation in the previous version of \"Browser\". Sorry for switching to Ninja Browser as base. Perhaps you could translate a second time?
https://github.com/JumpingYang001

lishoujun
Chinese translation
https://github.com/lishoujun

https://github.com/Secangkir-Kopi

splinet
Russian translation in the previous version of \"Browser\". Sorry for switching to Ninja Browser as base. Perhaps you could translate a second time?
https://github.com/splinet
